actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to amend the Act of May 17, 1954, relating to the Jefferson National Expansion Memorial, to strike the proposed limitation on park extension, to allow the acquisition of State lands by means other than donation, and to increase funding for the East Saint Louis portion of the Memorial.
short_title: Jefferson National Expansion Amendments Act of 1989

summary.text: Jefferson National Expansion Amendments Act of 1989 - Amends Federal law to eliminate acreage limitations on the expansion of the Jefferson National Expansion Memorial in East Saint Louis, Illinois. Authorizes the acquisition of Illinois State lands through means other than by donation. Repeals the requirement for the Secretary of the Interior's approval of a development and management plan for the East Saint Louis, Illinois, portion of the Memorial. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Jefferson National Expansion Amendments Act of 1989

A bill to amend the Act of May 17, 1954, relating to the Jefferson National Expansion Memorial, to strike the proposed limitation on park extension, to allow the acquisition of State lands by means other than donation, and to increase funding for the East Saint Louis portion of the Memorial.
